ai_explanation.introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is そうだん, which you will often hear in any situation where decision-making or seeking advice is involved. By understanding how to use this term effectively, you’ll feel more confident in your conversations and problem-solving interactions in Japanese. Let's dive in!
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: 相談 means "to consult or talk over" and is often used when discussing something with someone to gain their opinion or advice, planning something together, or even resolving a problem by having a discussion. It's quite a versatile word often related to conversations involving decision-making processes.
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.

consultation.MY: အကြံပေးခြင်း

examples.kanji: 私は友達に相談します。
examples.furigana: 私(わたし)は友達(ともだち)に相談(そうだん)します。

translations.HI: मैं अपने दोस्त से सलाह लेता हूँ।

examples.kanji: 私は仕事の相談をする。
examples.furigana: 私(わたし)は仕事(しごと)の相談(そうだん)をする。

translations.VI: Tôi thảo luận về công việc.
translations.HI: मैं काम के बारे में चर्चा करता हूँ।
translations.FA: من در مورد کار مشورت می‌کنم.

examples.kanji: 私は先生に相談します。
examples.furigana: 私(わたし)は先生(せんせい)に相談(そうだん)します。

translations.VI: Tôi tham khảo ý kiến giáo viên của mình.
translations.MY: ကျွန်တော် ဆရာဆရာမနဲ့ ပြိုင်ပွဲတက်ဖို့ တိုင်ပင်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मैं अपने शिक्षक से सलाह लेता हूँ।

examples.kanji: 先生に相談に乗ってもらいました。
examples.furigana: 先生(せんせい)に相談(そうだん)に乗(の)ってもらいました。

translations.EN: I got advice from my teacher.
translations.ID: Saya mendapat nasihat dari guru saya.
translations.ES: Recibí el consejo de mi profesor.
translations.VI: Tôi đã được giáo viên tư vấn.
translations.FR: J'ai obtenu des conseils de mon professeur.
translations.TL: Kumuha ako ng payo mula sa guro ko.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်၏ဆရာထံမှ အကြံပေးချက်ကို ရခဲ့သည်။
translations.HI: मुझे अपने शिक्षक से सलाह मिली।
translations.FA: من از معلم خود مشاوره گرفتم.

synonyms: 協議 : きょうぎ : conference
討論 : とうろん : debate
ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonyms of 相談 are きょうぎ and とうろん. 協議 focuses more on formal discussions or negotiations, often involving multiple parties. 討論 emphasizes debating or arguing over different points of view, which can be more about expressing differing opinions than just seeking advice.
antonyms: 独断 : どくだん : one's own judgement
一存 : いちぞん : one's own discretion
ai_explanation.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonyms of 相談 are どくだん and いちぞん. 独断 refers to making decisions alone without consulting others, highlighting the solitary nature of the decision. 一存 underscores exercising one's judgment, often independent and personal, without involving others.
